basic.description: Vector space concepts.  Hypothesis testing. Signal detection in discrete time including performance evaluation methods and sequential detection.  Parameter estimation, including Bayesian, maximum-likelihood and minimum-variance unbiased estimation.  Signal estimation in discrete time, including Kalman filtering, linear estimation, and Wiener filtering. Applications include communications, sensor array, image processing, and target tracking. Three term-hours; lectures.  S.D. Blostein.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Signal Detection & Estimation
